sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from "../components/Message"; import { getOrderDetails } from "../actions/orderActions"; // import { ORDER_CREATE_RESET } from '../constants/orderConstants' const OrderScreen = ({ match }) => { const orderId = match.params.id; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const orderDetails = useSelector((state) => state.orderCreate); const { order, loading, error } = orderDetails; useEffect(() => { dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) }, []); return loading ? : error ? {error} : <>

Order {order._id}

Note

{order.shippingAddress.address} {/* {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country} */}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? ( Oder is empty ) : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${order.itemsPrice} Service Fee ${order.shippingPrice} Tax ${order.taxPrice} Total ${order.totalPrice} }; export default OrderScreen;
